revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR1043ND |revision=v1.x |series=N450 |upc=845973051389 |ean=6935364051389 |asin= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_date=02/04/2010 |fcc_id=TE7WR1043NX |pcb_id=2050500098 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9132;AR9132-BC1E; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=STMicro |fla1_model=ST25P64V6P |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU561622FTP-D43 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9132;AR9132-BC1E; |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR9103 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8366RB |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |tp_firmware=OpenWrt,DD-WRT |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXXXX |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=94:0C:6D,F8:D1:11 |oui_eth=94:0C:6D,F8:D1:11 }} {{TagLine|Ultimate Wireless N Gigabit Router}} {{startflatlist|indent=1}} *[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=238&model=TL-WR1043ND Product page] *[http://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/TL-WR1043ND/index.htm Firmware Interface] *[http://www.tplink.com/en/support/download/?model=TL-WR1043ND&version=V1 Downloads] {{endflatlist}} The '''TP-LINK''' logo, "11N Wireless Giga Router", and "REV: 1.0" :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. The default SSID is probably '''TP-LINK_XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' :are the last three octets of the router WLAN MAC. There are multiple v1 revisions of this device. ===PSU=== The power supply shown for the device in the FCC photos is a '''Leader Electronics''' :MU18-2120150-A1 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.6A -> 12VDC, 1.5A). :.. though, powering the device with voltage '''up to 15V''' '''''may''''' be fine :w/ the 12V -> 3.3V regulator on-board. ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=62217 Main thread for the device on the '''DD-WRT''' forum] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=22742 Main thread for the device on the '''OpenWrt''' forum] :[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr1043nd?s=wr1043nd Device entry on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=148618 ''Canyon CNP-WF514N3A'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forum] (2050500107) :The [http://i442.photobucket.com/albums/qq143/SA924/CanyonRouter.jpg CANYON CNP-WF514N3A] is a TL-WR1043ND v1 (or equiv. OEM model). ===See also=== *'''TP-LINK TL-WR1043ND v1.8''' - "2050500098" rev:1.1 ([http://remont-aud.net/dump/planshety_i_ehl_knigi/tp_link/tp_link_tl_wr1043nd_ver_1_8_shassi_main_board_2050500098_rev_1_1_gfm01/466-1-0-38002 dump]) :CPU: [[Atheros]] AR9132-BC1E :Flash: ''Spansion'' S25FL064PIF :RAM: ''[[Winbond]]'' W9425G6JH-5 ==Images== ---- __NOTOC__
